ModMetaData.name: VE-CO Blood and Pain
ModMetaData.author: Aristocat
ModMetaData.description:
- Injuries cause bleeding three times more.
- Injuries cause twice more pain and thrice for non-bleeding injuries(ex, bruises).
- Blood loss causes pain and more severe conscious lose.
- Punctured organs now cause three times severe bleeding. (In vanilla punctuered kidney, lungs and liver etc doesn't cause additional blood loss, only heart and neck does.)
- Go Juice pain reduction increased to 80% from 10%, and now increase blood filtration and blood pumping.
- Severed body parts now cause extreme pain and bleed.
